name: Eagle Point Credit Company Inc.
description: Eagle Point Credit Company Inc. is a publicly traded investment company that focuses on generating income through investments in collateralized loan obligations (CLOs) and other debt instruments. Founded in 2014, the company aims to provide investors with a sustainable dividend yield while preserving capital. Eagle Point Credit invests primarily in the equity and subordinated tranches of CLOs, which are structured finance instruments backed by a diversified pool of loans. The company is managed by Eagle Point Asset Management, which utilizes a disciplined investment process and extensive market research to identify attractive opportunities. With a strong commitment to risk management, Eagle Point Credit seeks to navigate complex credit markets and provide stable returns for its shareholders. The company trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker EP.C. In addition to CLO investments, Eagle Point Credit may also engage in other forms of credit investment, including direct lending and investment in corporate loans. By leveraging its expertise in credit markets, Eagle Point Credit aims to build a robust portfolio that can withstand economic fluctuations and deliver consistent performance over time.
